setting.info: CheckList algorithm - Minimal late decel confidence value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal late decel amount value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal large and long decel amount value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal (late decel amount > 0) and large and long decel amount value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal (late decel amount > 0) and prolonged decel with minimal defined height amount value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal prolonged decel height value.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal contractions amount.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal long contractions (> 120 seconds) amount.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal accelerations amount.
CheckList algorithm - Minimal baseline variability value.
Window size to qualify Negative CheckList state in seconds.
Minimal amount of data to qualify CheckList state calculation in percent.
Positive state persistency - interval in minutes
Positive state persistency - required percentage of the interval
Negative state persistency - interval in minutes
Negative state persistency - required percentage of the interval
Determine if to save complete CheckList information history for discharged visits (TRUE), or only minimal information allowing to produce popup acknowledge summary reports (FALSE).
A system initiated acknowlege for all unacknowledged popups will be triggered after a downtime longer than this duration in minutes
Default Export duration in minutes (15/30).
Duration between checks if export interval is complete (Millisec).
Interval for connectivity check with the CALM Server (Millisec).
Used for encrypting messages between Export dialog (workstation) and Export plugin (server).
PeriAuth connectivity port#
User group for authenticating CALM local users

Round calculated Mean Baseline FHR value to nearest rounded value. e.g. if set to '5' then a calculated value of 137 will be rounded to 135 to be exported, while 138 will be rounded to 140. If set to '1' no rounding is done and the originally calculated values are exported instead.

Round calculated MVU value to nearest rounded value. e.g. if set to '5' then a calculated value of 137 will be rounded to 135 to be exported, while 138 will be rounded to 140. If set to '1' no rounding is done and the originally calculated values are exported instead.

Round calculated Contraction Duration value to nearest rounded value. e.g. if set to '5' then a calculated value of 137 will be rounded to 135 to be exported, while 138 will be rounded to 140. If set to '1' no rounding is done and the originally calculated values are exported instead.

Round calculated Contraction Intensity value to nearest rounded value. e.g. if set to '5' then a calculated value of 137 will be rounded to 135 to be exported, while 138 will be rounded to 140. If set to '1' no rounding is done and the originally calculated values are exported instead.
Indicates if the site uses CALM services.
Saves changes in CheckList state to CALM concept.
Minimal level of event type which will be written to Debug view\Trace.
Minimal level of event type which will be written to the Console.
Minimal level of event type which will be written to the EventLog.
Name of EventLog for events.
